title: The World is Unfair
body:
The World is Unfair

Evan sat down near the front row of the aeroplane where most of the teachers were sitting, so that he won't have to deal with some random dude.

When all the students sat down the seat beside Evan was still unoccupied.

Well, it's a common thing for students to sit further away from the teachers when going on a school trip, right? So no one sat beside him.

After all the students sat down and the plane was about to take off Edward came and sat beside him.

Evan was not bothered when Edward sat beside him because he has a good impression of him. After all, the last time when Olivia suddenly attacked him, it was Edward who stopped her.

"How have you been this past month?" Edward asked him in a friendly tone after sitting down.

"Pretty good I think, I took a vacation to escape the attention brought by a certain individual," Evan said while shrugging his shoulders. He knew Edward asked him that question because of the articles that were published.
